name: Imaginario Colectivo
overview:
“At last a scientist has found a way to literally change the world with ideas. The miracle is possible thanks to the "Collective Imaginary". The possible existence of a collective subconscious that pushed the world in some way had been talked about for some time, but it had never been proven before.

Unfortunately, something went wrong and the entire population fell into a deep sleep linked to the system. As a result, the world has lost its meaning and has become a strange place full of beings imagined by consciences that, deep down, are prisoners of the system and of their own creation.

In this adventure you adopt the role of Miki and your mission is none other than to restore the natural order. It is no small thing, but Miki is not either. Will you be at his height? "
